channel.title: 64 bit run.bat & compile.bat for Delta?
channel.description: I recently got a 64 bit computer :rolleyes: and run.bat and compile.bat doesn't work for the server. so i'm looking for a run.bat & a compile.bat that works with 64 bit. Thx

item.title: 64 bit run.bat & compile.bat for Delta?
item.dc:creator: @hostilebleedz hostilebleedz
item.description:
@hostilebleedz wrote:

Jailed. those ones probally won’t work above… Teamviewer with me and i’ll help you… add me on msn… recon_x@hotmail.com i’ll set you up… you need to do more then edit the damn run.bat or compile.bat

Read full topic

item.title: 64 bit run.bat & compile.bat for Delta?
item.dc:creator: @KrypitcRc KrypitcRc
item.description:
@KrypitcRc wrote:

Run

@echo off title EvoScape "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\java.exe" -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

Compile

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause

There what I use so if it help’s great if it don’t, Sorry :\

@Brandon
Gui is for delta, Your probably using a PI which doesn’t use Gui

Read full topic

item.title: 64 bit run.bat & compile.bat for Delta?
item.dc:creator: @Brandon_o_0 Brandon o_0
item.description:
@Brandon_o_0 wrote:

[quote=“s 3 3 m 3, post:2, topic:371305”]My run.bat always works and im on 64-bit, but then again im not you. But here is a compile code that you can modify to your java settings.

@echo off title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_22/bin/javac.exe" -d ./bin ./src/*.java pause

and if you’re looking for a client run.bat for 64-bit heres one (requires Gui)

@echo off COLOR 04 title "your sever name here" is running! "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\javaW.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit

Sorry if it’s not what you’re looking for, but i tried.

~Greg[/quote]

How do u get the gui? cause i have 64 bit and it says: could not find main class:gui =\

Read full topic

item.title: 64 bit run.bat & compile.bat for Delta?
item.dc:creator: @s_3_3_m_3 s 3 3 m 3
item.description:
@s_3_3_m_3 wrote:

My run.bat always works and im on 64-bit, but then again im not you. But here is a compile code that you can modify to your java settings.

@echo off title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_22/bin/javac.exe" -d ./bin ./src/*.java pause

and if you’re looking for a client run.bat for 64-bit heres one (requires Gui)

@echo off COLOR 04 title "your sever name here" is running! "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\javaW.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit

Sorry if it’s not what you’re looking for, but i tried.

~Greg

Read full topic
